name: The Lost Samurai
description:
The Lost Samurai is a Top Down kind of Hack and Slash, where the player must sneak through enemy camps, find a way to get to The Master, and take him down!
You can gain more health through killing enemies and absorbing their souls
I hope you enjoy this game I made over a weekend!

Controls:
Left Click - Slash in direction of mouse
Right Click -  Dash in direction of movement
WASD - Move Character
Escape - Pause Menu

This game was made for Mini Jam 72 in 72 Hours
